unnormalised: Coding in C++ is like trying to explain "jugaad" to someone who only speaks Python – you can do it, but why would you put yourself through that? Just use a framework, yaar, save yourself the headache and use 100x less lines of code.
normalised: Coding in C plus plus is like trying to explain "jugaad" to someone who only speaks Python – you can do it, but why would you put yourself through that? Just use a framework, yaar, save yourself the headache and use one hundred times less lines of code.
